text: "Working Day and Night" is a 1979 song by American recording artist Michael Jackson and is the third track from his fifth studio album Off the Wall (1979). Despite not released as a single, Jackson performed the song live on his first two concert tours. It was used in the 2007 Ice Cube comedy movie Are We Done Yet?. == Official versions== * Album version – 5:12 * Original demo from 1978 – 4:10 * Immortal version – 3:36 * Live at Triumph Tour (The Jacksons) – 6:53 * Live at Wembley July 16, 1988 (from the Bad World Tour, available on the deluxe edition of Bad 25) – 5:55 ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Disco songs Category:Funk songs Category:Michael Jackson songs
title: Working Day and Night
